New Records: Hield has made 12 of 16 3-pointers in his first two games, the most in NBA history for a player with a new team.
Key Match Events: Hield scored 24 points in the first half, hitting 6 of 7 3-pointers.
Trayce Jackson-Davis' inside shot made it 74-47 with 8:15 left in the third quarter.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Jazz are 0-26 in games shooting below 33%.
